description:
Need to install _ into builtins using gettext.install.  The nova-combined endpoint was added in eventlet_merge and I let it slip through the reviews for i18n... which means it produces this when run:

swalsh@novadev:~/openstack/nova$ bin/nova-combined --flagfile=../nova.conf 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "bin/nova-combined", line 36, in <module>
    from nova import api
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/__init__.py", line 33, in <module>
    from nova.api import ec2
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py", line 34, in <module>
    from nova.api.ec2 import admin
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/ec2/admin.py", line 27, in <module>
    from nova.auth import manager
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/auth/manager.py", line 32, in <module>
    from nova import crypto
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/crypto.py", line 42, in <module>
    flags.DEFINE_string('ca_file', 'cacert.pem', _('Filename of root CA'))
NameError: name '_' is not defined
title: nova-combined needs gettext installed

comments.content:
Need to install _ into builtins using gettext.install.  The nova-combined endpoint was added in eventlet_merge and I let it slip through the reviews for i18n... which means it produces this when run:

swalsh@novadev:~/openstack/nova$ bin/nova-combined --flagfile=../nova.conf 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "bin/nova-combined", line 36, in <module>
    from nova import api
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/__init__.py", line 33, in <module>
    from nova.api import ec2
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py", line 34, in <module>
    from nova.api.ec2 import admin
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/api/ec2/admin.py", line 27, in <module>
    from nova.auth import manager
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/auth/manager.py", line 32, in <module>
    from nova import crypto
  File "/home/swalsh/openstack/nova/nova/crypto.py", line 42, in <module>
    flags.DEFINE_string('ca_file', 'cacert.pem', _('Filename of root CA'))
NameError: name '_' is not defined
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content:
Jay,

this is in trunk. I fixed this with lp:~armando-migliaccio/nova/xenapi-unittests :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~armando-migliaccio

comments.content:
hehe, we just realized this :) marking invalid..
